property.name: sun.java.command
property.value: org.codehaus.plexus.classworlds.launcher.Launcher -B -D enforcer.skip=true -D dependency-check.skip=true -D skipITs=true -D cobertura.skip=true -D maven.repo.local=/root/./workspace/1and1/ejb-cdi-unit/389259868/.m2 -D rat.skip=true -D findbugs.skip=true -D skip.bower=true -D gpg.skip=true -D checkstyle.skip=true -D skip.gulp=true -D license.skip=true -D skip.npm=true test

testcase.name: testMariaDb

error.message: An error occurred while starting the database

testcase.error:
ch.vorburger.exec.ManagedProcessException: An error occurred while starting the database at com.oneandone.ejbcdiunit.mvcc.MvccTest.createConnection(MvccTest.java:62) at com.oneandone.ejbcdiunit.mvcc.MvccTest.initDb(MvccTest.java:77) at com.oneandone.ejbcdiunit.mvcc.MvccTest.testMariaDb(MvccTest.java:133) Caused by: ch.vorburger.exec.ManagedProcessException: Asked to wait for "mysqld: ready for connections." from Program [/tmp/MariaDB4j/base/bin/mysqld, --no-defaults, --console, --skip-grant-tables, --max_allowed_packet=64M, --basedir=/tmp/MariaDB4j/base, --datadir=/tmp/MariaDB4j/data/3406, --port=3406, --socket=/tmp/MariaDB4j.3406.sock] (in working directory /tmp/MariaDB4j/base), but it already exited!
